name: Business Name Generator
author: DesignBro

sections.description:
Business Name Generator is the most popular company and branding name generator for WordPress. With it you can easily create short, brandable, creative business names and claim the domain in seconds. This can help generate hundreds of business name ideas for you.

Enter words that communicate a value, emotion, feeling, strength, uniqueness of your business, and our business name creator will provide a ton of potential brandable names that’s unique and memorable.

Business Name Generator is compatible with PHP from 5.6 and upwards (including 8.0).

10 SECONDS BUSINESS NAME CREATOR

You can have a short, creative and catchy brand name in seconds. This free brand name generator lets you jump from naming your brand to securing the domain name, to starting your small business or eCommerce store – all in a few clicks. The more specific your keywords, the better the results.

HOW TO USE THE DESIGNBRO BUSINESS NAME GENERATOR:

  1. Search using words you want in your company’s business name
  2. Pick a creative business name that is catchy
  3. Get your business name and check its domain name availability

WAIT, IT’S FREE?

Yes, it’s really free. There’s no premium version and no need to pay money to get access to features.

Business Name Generator plugin depends on Namecheap’s domain registration service
For the term that you search from our form, the generated business name is used for searching an available domain name for you.
For example you search for “Design” and the tool generates a name “DesignBro”, then the result then takes you to namecheap’s domain registration page for https://www.namecheap.com/domains/registration/results/?domain=designbro.com

Go to DesignBro or our Blog for more design inspiration!
sections.installation:
The plugin is simple to install:
1. Download designbro-brandnamegenerator.zip
2. Install the plugin via plugin upload in the WordPress Administrator section
3. Go to the plugin management page and enable the plugin
4. Configure the options from the settings page
5. Include the form in a page of your liking. You just have to add the shortcode: [dbro_display_form]
